name: EcoVerse
description:
EcoVerse is an old project of mine, which I made in my early days of game programming.

The original idea was that you can control the world and the environment and the animals would spawn automatically, wherever the conditions would be right. The concept evolved after a while, into what it is now. 

I just thought I'd share this in case anyone is interested. I'm not developing this anymore, as I have since switched to a different engine.
